title: ReciKey
description: Fridge full of random ingredients? Not sure what to cook? Recikey is here to help.

title: Shreddit
description: Make simple melodies and save them to the feed, vote on your favorites, and add comments to let users know what you think!

title: Settle-It
description: Ever wanted to settle a debate simply and decisively? Post your side of an argument and invite another user to explain their side. Users vote to decide who wins so you can finally Settle It!
